spells.name: Pyroblast
spells.description: Deal 18 damage disregarding defence to a target.

spells.name: Stubbornness
spells.description: Gain 10 defence until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Tangle
spells.description: Grow thorns under a target standing on the ground. The target needs to spend 1 action to escape the thorns. While the target is tangled, they have 0 agility and cannot move.

primaryWeapon.name: Mithril Claws
primaryWeapon.description: A pair of claws made of pure mithril.

armour.name: Druid Cloak
armour.description: A druid's majestic cloak of animal hides and plant material.
